you ever come to the Kingdom of Anyagas,"},{"lineNumber":211434,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私のところに頼ってくれたまえ」","translatedEnglishLine":"please rely on difficult,"},{"lineNumber":211436,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私個人の援助として","translatedEnglishLine":"but as my personal tenacity.\""},{"lineNumber":211446,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっはっはっ、頼もしいな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha ha ha, reliable indeed."},{"lineNumber":211447,"originalJapaneseLine":"　若者はそれくらい気概がある方がいい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Young people should have that much fighting spirit.\""},{"lineNumber":211448,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、＜エール＞……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, <Yell>... "},{"lineNumber":211449,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こないだのアレ見てよくそんなこと言えるな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"After what happened the other day, how can you say something like that...?\""},{"lineNumber":211450,"originalJapaneseLine":"と、和やかに会話をしていると、","translatedEnglishLine":"As they were having a peaceful conversation,"},{"lineNumber":211451,"originalJapaneseLine":"それをぶち壊すような奇声が上がった。","translatedEnglishLine":"a strange cry suddenly broke the calm."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、よく分からないだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I don't really understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ、分かれば面白いのだがな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, it would be interesting if I understood..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そろそろ休憩をと思っていたところ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, I was just thinking it's about time for a break.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良かったら君達も一緒にどうかね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you'd like, why don't you all join me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズの面々に誘われ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Invited by the members of the Popinz,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は共に昼食を取っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you all were having lunch together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十数人のポピンズ達は食事中も絶えず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The dozen or so Popinz kept,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実験やカラクリの話に花を咲かせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even during the meal, talking enthusiastically about experiments and mechanisms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとも賑やかだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making it quite a lively atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、君達はシャングリラまで行くのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you guys are going all the way to Shangri-La?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「冒険か……いいものだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "An adventure, huh... that's a fine thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふ、こう見えても私も昔は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh, believe it or not, I used to do all sorts of things in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々なことをしたものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've done many things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと、すまないね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, sorry about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 年を取ると昔話ばかりしたがるのは悪い癖だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a bad habit to keep telling old stories as you get older."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「失礼、自己紹介もまだだったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Excuse me, I haven't introduced myself yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はポピンズの王、東芝と言う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Toshiba, the King of the Popinz.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 共に実験をしていたこちらが私の12人の子供達だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These twelve here conducting experiments with me are my children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げっ、おっさん、王様かよ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, old man, you're the king!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱねぇ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's insane!"
"Toshiba, king...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はて、どこかで聞いたような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I feel like I've heard that somewhere before..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、君達は何を求めてシャングリラまで？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, what is it that you seek by going all the way to Shangri-La?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこは交易の要の都市だが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's a key trading city, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 商人のたぐいには見えないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you don't look like merchants."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット・カラーに会いに行くのが目的かなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is your goal to go meet Reset Color?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット殿に？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To Lord Reset?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへーん、聞いて驚け！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, listen up and be amazed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達は魔王ランスを倒す為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are forming a party of the Demon King's children to defeat the Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の子達のパーティーを作る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are making a party of the Demon King's children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、こっちがその魔王の子の一人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And over here is one of those Demon King's children!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's <Yell>!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の脅威はポピンズの世界でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The threat of the Demon King is known even in the Popinz world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞き及んでいるが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as we've heard...,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを解決せんとする者もいたとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I never expected there to be those who try to resolve it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、挑戦は若者の特権か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, challenges belong to the young.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、応援させてもらおう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Very well, I shall support you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしもアニャガス王国に来ることがあれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you ever come to the Kingdom of Anyagas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私のところに頼ってくれたまえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please rely on me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「国として援助……は、さすがに無理だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for aid as a nation... that would be difficult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私個人の援助として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but as my personal assistance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日の寝床くらいは用意しよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can at least provide a place to sleep for a few days."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は常に挑戦する者を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I always want to be someone who supports those who challenge themselves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 支援する者でありたいからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the kind of person I want to be."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、ありがとうございますだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, thank you very much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは嬉しいだす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That makes me happy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、君は責任感に溢れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you seem like a young person full of responsibility...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若者のようだね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...a real youth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、昔の私に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, I wish I could make the old me take a medicine brewed from your grit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君の爪の垢を煎じて飲ませたいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to brew and drink your tenacity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはっはっ、頼もしいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha ha ha, reliable indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若者はそれくらい気概がある方がいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Young people should have that much fighting spirit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、＜エール＞……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, <Yell>...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こないだのアレ見てよくそんなこと言えるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After what happened the other day, how can you say something like that...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、和やかに会話をしていると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they were having a peaceful conversation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをぶち壊すような奇声が上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a strange cry suddenly broke the calm.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「よ、よく分からないだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I don't really understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふむ、分かれば面白いのだがな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, it would be interesting if I understood..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そろそろ休憩をと思っていたところ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, I was just thinking it's about time for a break.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 良かったら君達も一緒にどうかね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you'd like, why don't you all join me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポピンズの面々に誘われ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Invited by the members of the Popinz,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなた達は共に昼食を取っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you all were having lunch together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 十数人のポピンズ達は食事中も絶えず
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The dozen or so Popinz kept,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実験やカラクリの話に花を咲かせ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even during the meal, talking enthusiastically about experiments and mechanisms,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんとも賑やかだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making it quite a lively atmosphere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、君達はシャングリラまで行くのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you guys are going all the way to Shangri-La?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「冒険か……いいものだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "An adventure, huh... that's a fine thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふふ、こう見えても私も昔は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heh heh, believe it or not, I used to do all sorts of things in the past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 色々なことをしたものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've done many things."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おっと、すまないね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, sorry about that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 年を取ると昔話ばかりしたがるのは悪い癖だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a bad habit to keep telling old stories as you get older."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「失礼、自己紹介もまだだったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Excuse me, I haven't introduced myself yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はポピンズの王、東芝と言う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am Toshiba, the King of the Popinz.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 共に実験をしていたこちらが私の12人の子供達だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: These twelve here conducting experiments with me are my children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げっ、おっさん、王様かよ！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What, old man, you're the king!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぱねぇ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's insane!"
"Toshiba, king...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はて、どこかで聞いたような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I feel like I've heard that somewhere before..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし、君達は何を求めてシャングリラまで？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But, what is it that you seek by going all the way to Shangri-La?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこは交易の要の都市だが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's a key trading city, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 商人のたぐいには見えないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you don't look like merchants."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット・カラーに会いに行くのが目的かなあ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Is your goal to go meet Reset Color?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リセット殿に？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To Lord Reset?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへーん、聞いて驚け！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, listen up and be amazed!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺達は魔王ランスを倒す為、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We are forming a party of the Demon King's children to defeat the Demon King Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王の子達のパーティーを作る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are making a party of the Demon King's children."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、こっちがその魔王の子の一人！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And over here is one of those Demon King's children!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜エール＞だ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's <Yell>!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……なんと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王の脅威はポピンズの世界でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The threat of the Demon King is known even in the Popinz world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞き及んでいるが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as we've heard...,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを解決せんとする者もいたとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I never expected there to be those who try to resolve it..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや、挑戦は若者の特権か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, challenges belong to the young.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うむ、応援させてもらおう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Very well, I shall support you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もしもアニャガス王国に来ることがあれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you ever come to the Kingdom of Anyagas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私のところに頼ってくれたまえ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please rely on me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「国として援助……は、さすがに無理だが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As for aid as a nation... that would be difficult,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私個人の援助として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but as my personal assistance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日の寝床くらいは用意しよう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can at least provide a place to sleep for a few days."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は常に挑戦する者を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I always want to be someone who supports those who challenge themselves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 支援する者でありたいからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the kind of person I want to be."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わあ、ありがとうございますだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, thank you very much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは嬉しいだす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That makes me happy."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほう、君は責任感に溢れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh, you seem like a young person full of responsibility...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若者のようだね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...a real youth."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふっ、昔の私に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, I wish I could make the old me take a medicine brewed from your grit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君の爪の垢を煎じて飲ませたいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to brew and drink your tenacity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっはっはっ、頼もしいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha ha ha, reliable indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 若者はそれくらい気概がある方がいい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Young people should have that much fighting spirit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、＜エール＞……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, <Yell>...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こないだのアレ見てよくそんなこと言えるな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After what happened the other day, how can you say something like that...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と、和やかに会話をしていると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As they were having a peaceful conversation,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをぶち壊すような奇声が上がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a strange cry suddenly broke the calm.
